title: CBT Tools : Revit Plugins + Dashboard
description: Revit C# add-ins (WebView UI) for model management + cleanup, paired with a React dashboard and MongoDB backend with WebSockets for live metrics.

title: Rental Lease Visualizer
description: 3D leasing analytics viewer combining Rhino geometry and Excel lease data, featuring interactive unit selection, hover details, and a timeline slider for visualizing occupancy over time.
